entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
